title: Tiyoweh La Quietud
typeOfFood: Vegan, International, Mediterranean, Juice bar, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Fusion
description: Vegetarian turned all-vegan in 2016. Makes its own flat bread, uses regional produce. Inside is recycled furniture and decoration, a meditation and a chill-out area on premises. Has Wi-Fi. Dog friendly. Offers therapies, gives cookery classes and workshops. Organizes an organic products consumer group that's open to the public.
streetAddress: Calle San Pedro 22, Barrio Las Letras
